parameter.name: user_map_file
parameter.description:
Specifies the path to a user-mapping file used to map local user accounts to Azure Entra ID user accounts, allowing them to authenticate using Entra ID credentials.
Each line of the file must contain a single mapping entry in the format: .IP local_username:name@domain .PP Blank lines and lines beginning with '#' are ignored.
Example user-map file entries: .RS 4 .nf # local_username:samaccountname@domain alice:alice@contoso.com bob:bob.smith@example.org svcuser:service.account@tenant.local .fi .RE
